ModulePrefs.title: Mahjong Multiplayer
ModulePrefs.description: A multiplayer remake of a classic puzzle game Mahjong. Your job is to pair up matching tiles until the board is cleared.
ModulePrefs.author: Arvo Sulakatko

Module.Content: <object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" data="MonetizedNonobaClient.swf" width="800" height="500" allowFullScreen="true" allowNetworking="all" allowScriptAccess="always"> <param name="movie" value="MonetizedNonobaClient.swf" /> </object>
